name: Escape the House of Hell: Point & Click Adventure
name_original: Escape the House of Hell: Point & Click Adventure
description:
Escape the House of Hell is a first person point and click graphic puzzle adventure, similar to games you may have played in the ’90’s or similar to a virtual escape rooms you may have played. A simple gameplay interface consisting of the world that you explore and an inventory panel where you can collect, combine and use items you find along the way to solve puzzles.

Explore areas, collect hidden objects and take in your surroundings. You will need all of your puzzle solving skills to put together a plan to make your way through the house, solving riddles and down the many paths..

How you tackle the puzzles is down to you. Each puzzle has a logical solution, so take your time, there is no rush and enjoy the process of understanding what you have to do.

FEATURES:
  • Simple, intuitive point and click tap-to-play gameplay
  • Beautiful 3D, original graphics with over 70 interactive scenes
  • Captivating and unique story – excite your imagination!
  • Future updates to improve play and interactive new elements
  • Compatible with all devices

Escape the House of Hell is one of a number of adventures.

Thanks for supporting original, British made, independent game development – your feedback is much appreciated!
